comment: So in conclusion, watch out for your opponent's threats, and if you have passed pawns on the 7th rank (row), do all you can to protect them. They can often decide games if they can queen, because they will force more valuable pieces to sac themselves to stop it. Also, in endgames, use your king to support your passed pawns, and to limit the activity of your opponent's king.
